author: Vikas Vasudeva
title: No move on extending curfew yet: Punjab CM
description: ‘Call would be taken after Cabinet meeting on April 10’
content:
Punjab Chief Minister Amarinder Singh on Wednesday said that no decision had been taken yet on extending the curfew in the State beyond April 14 even as the State reported seven fresh cases of COVID-19.
The State government was yet to take a decision in the … [+1382 chars]
